SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem

Class Exam

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.Exam
public class Exam extends Object
Represents an Exam, storing the name of the exam, list of questions and student grades

  • Property Summary

    Properties
    Type
    Property
    Description
    javafx.beans.property.StringProperty
    courseID
    Returns a StringProperty representation of the course ID associated with this exam.
    javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty
    duration
    Returns an IntegerProperty representing the duration of the exam in minutes.

    examName
    Returns a StringProperty representation of the exam name.

  • Constructor Details

    • Exam

      public Exam(String examName, Course course, boolean isPublished, int duration)
      Constructs a new Exam object with the specified exam name, associated course, publication status and duration. If the course is not null, this exam will be added to the course's list of exams.
      Parameters:
      examName - The name of the exam.
      course - The Course object associated with this exam.
      isPublished - A boolean indicating whether the exam has been published.
      duration - The duration of the exam in minutes.

    • Exam

      public Exam(String examName, Course course, boolean isPublished, int duration, ArrayList<Question> questions)
      Constructs a new Exam object with the specified exam name, associated course, publication status, duration, and a list of questions. If the course is not null, this exam will be added to the course's list of exams.
      Parameters:
      examName - The name of the exam.
      course - The Course object associated with this exam.
      isPublished - A boolean indicating whether the exam has been published.
      duration - The duration of the exam in minutes.
      questions - An ArrayList containing the Question objects included in this exam.

    • Exam

      public Exam(String examName, String courseID, boolean isPublished, int duration, ArrayList<Question> questions)
      Constructs a new Exam object with the specified exam name, course ID, publication status, duration, and a list of questions.
      Parameters:
      examName - The name of the exam.
      courseID - The identifier for the Course associated with this exam.
      isPublished - A boolean indicating whether the exam has been published.
      duration - The duration of the exam in minutes.
      questions - An ArrayList containing the Question objects included in this exam.

    • Exam

      public Exam(String examName, String courseID, boolean isPublished, int duration)
      Constructs a new Exam object with the specified exam name, course ID, publication status, and duration.
      Parameters:
      examName - The name of the exam.
      courseID - The identifier for the Course associated with this exam.
      isPublished - A boolean indicating whether the exam has been published.
      duration - The duration of the exam in minutes.

  • Method Details

    • examNameProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty examNameProperty()
      Returns a StringProperty representation of the exam name.
      Returns:
      A SimpleStringProperty containing the exam name.
      See Also:
      • getExamName()
      • setExamName(String)

    • isPublishedProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty isPublishedProperty()
      Returns a BooleanProperty indicating whether the exam is published.
      Returns:
      A SimpleBooleanProperty representing the publication status of the exam.

    • durationProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty durationProperty()
      Returns an IntegerProperty representing the duration of the exam in minutes.
      Returns:
      A SimpleIntegerProperty containing the exam duration.
      See Also:
      • getDuration()
      • setDuration(int)

    • courseIDProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty courseIDProperty()
      Returns a StringProperty representation of the course ID associated with this exam.
      Returns:
      A SimpleStringProperty containing the course ID.

    • getExamName

      public String getExamName()
      Retrieves the name of the exam.
      Returns:
      The name of the exam as a String.

    • setExamName

      public void setExamName(String examName)
      Sets a new name for the exam.
      Parameters:
      examName - The new name to be set for the exam.

    • getIsPublished

      public boolean getIsPublished()
      Checks if the exam is published.
      Returns:
      True if the exam is published, false otherwise.

    • setPublished

      public void setPublished(boolean isPublished)
      Sets the publication status of the exam.
      Parameters:
      isPublished - The new publication status to be set for the exam.

    • getDuration

      public int getDuration()
      Retrieves the duration of the exam in minutes.
      Returns:
      The duration of the exam as an int.

    • setDuration

      public void setDuration(int duration)
      Sets a new duration for the exam.
      Parameters:
      duration - The new duration to be set for the exam in minutes.

    • getQuestions

      public ArrayList<Question> getQuestions()
      Retrieves the list of questions associated with the exam.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all Question objects included in this exam.

    • setQuestions

      public void setQuestions(ArrayList<Question> questions)
      Sets a new list of questions for the exam.
      Parameters:
      questions - The new ArrayList of Question objects to be set for the exam.

    • getCourse

      public Course getCourse()
      Retrieves the Course object associated with this exam.
      Returns:
      The Course object if courseID is not null, otherwise returns null.

    • setCourse

      public void setCourse(Course course)
      Sets a new course for the exam. If there was an existing course associated with this exam, it removes the exam from that course before setting the new one.
      Parameters:
      course - The new Course object to be set for the exam.

    • getStudentGrades

      public HashMap<String,Grade> getStudentGrades()
      Retrieves the HashMap of student grades associated with this exam.
      Returns:
      A HashMap where keys are student IDs (String) and values are their corresponding Grades.

    • setStudentGrades

      public void setStudentGrades(HashMap<String,Grade> studentToGrades)
      Sets a new HashMap of student grades for the exam.
      Parameters:
      studentToGrades - The new HashMap to be set for student grades in this exam.

    • addQuestion

      public void addQuestion(Question question)
      Adds a question to the list of questions for the exam. Throws an exception if the question already exists in the exam.
      Parameters:
      question - The new Question object to be added to the exam.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the question already exists in the exam.

    • removeQuestion

      public boolean removeQuestion(Question question)
      Removes a question from the list of questions for the exam. Throws an exception if the question does not exist in the exam.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to be removed from the exam.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the question does not exist in the exam.

    • updateQuestion

      public boolean updateQuestion(Question question, String content, String[] options, String answer, int score, String type)

    • getFullScore

      public int getFullScore()
      Calculates and returns the total score of all questions in the exam.
      Returns:
      The sum of scores of all questions in the exam.

    • parseAnswer

      public String parseAnswer(String answer)
      Parses a string answer by sorting its characters.
      Parameters:
      answer - The answer to be parsed.
      Returns:
      A new string with sorted characters from the original answer.

    • grade

      public Integer grade(ArrayList<Integer> answers)
      Grades an exam based on a list of student answers. The grading logic differs depending on whether each question is multiple-choice or single-choice.
      Parameters:
      answers - An ArrayList containing the student's answers for each question.
      Returns:
      The total score obtained by the student in this exam.

    • gradeStudent

      public void gradeStudent(Student student, Integer examScore, int timeSpend)
      Records a student's grade for this exam. The time spent by the student is capped at the duration of the exam.
      Parameters:
      student - The Student object whose grade is to be recorded.
      examScore - The score obtained by the student in this exam.
      timeSpend - The time (in minutes) taken by the student to complete the exam.

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Overrides:

      public int hashCode()
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object
